title: Mizoram University Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Guest Faculty Posts
description: The Mizoram University has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Guest Faculty Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech and MCA students can apply for the Mizoram University Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application ...
